name: Mask Shards
tooltip: Mask shards can increase your max HP. Each 4 shards count as 1%

name: Spool Fragments
tooltip: Spool fragments can increase your max silk. Each 2 shards count as 1%

items.location: At the end of a long room in the Deep Docks (map link)

items.name: Spool Fragment 3
items.location: In Greymoor, right and up of the Bell bench (map link)

items.location: Behind a breakable wall in Weavenest Atla (map link)

items.name: Spool Fragment 6
items.location: Purchased from Frey after completing the mission "My Missing Courier" (map link)

name: Skills
tooltip: Damaging skills which consume silk. Each skill counts as 1%

name: Tools
tooltip: Red, yellow, and blue tools. Each tool counts as 1%. Upgrading tools does not affect completion %.

name: Crafting kit upgrades
tooltip: Each crafting kit upgrade counts as 1%.

name: Tool pouch upgrades
tooltip: Each tool pouch upgrade counts as 1%.

name: Crests
tooltip: Each crest (other than the base Hunter) counts as 1%.

items.name: Silk heart 2
items.location: After The Unravelled bossfight in Whiteward (map link)

items.name: Silk heart 3
items.location: After Lace bossfight in The Cradle (map link)
